TextView.android:text: This Privacy Agreement (the 'Agreement') outlines the terms and conditions under which Ecometrics (the 'App') collects, uses, stores, and protects users' personal information, including location data. By using the Ecometrics App, you agree to the terms laid out in this Agreement.
The App may collect personal information such as name, email address, and user preferences to enhance user experience and provide personalized features.
Ecometrics may access and collect location data to provide location-based services and relevant information.
Ecometrics utilizes personal information to enhance user experience, provide personalized content, and improve App functionality.
Location data is used to offer location-based services, such as displaying local environmental information and recommending eco-friendly businesses.
Ecometrics employs industry-standard security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
Ecometrics does not sell, rent, or share personal information with third parties for marketing purposes without user consent.
